{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class Duration &gt;
static std::chrono::tai_time&lt;std::common_type_t&lt;Duration, std::chrono::seconds&gt;&gt;
    from_utc( const std::chrono::utc_time&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Converts the {{tt|utc_time}} {{c|t}} to a {{tt|tai_time}} representing the same point in time.

===Return value===
A {{lc|std::chrono::tai_time}} representing the same point in time as {{c|t}}, computed as if by constructing a value of the return type from {{c|t.time_since_epoch()}} and adding {{c|378691210s}} (378691210 is the number of seconds between the epochs of the two clocks: 1958-01-01 00:00:00 TAI and 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC).
